snippet: Senator Harry Reid on Monday morning blistered Speaker John A. Boehner in a statement, worsening the already tense atmosphere over the shutdown and debt ceiling negotiations.
abstract: Senator Harry Reid on Monday morning blistered Speaker John A. Boehner in a statement, worsening the already tense atmosphere over the shutdown and debt ceiling negotiations.

headline.main: With Reid Statement, Relationship With Boehner Grows More Acid
